techmeme.title: Study: a year after Meta blocked news content in Canada due to the Online News Act, Canadians' total engagement with news content on social media is down 43% (The Canadian Press)
Turkey blocks Instagram without stating a reason or the duration; a Turkish official claimed Instagram blocked condolence posts on Ismail Haniyeh's killing (Tuvan Gumrukcu/Reuters)
Sources: Apple in recent months has demanded Tencent and ByteDance close loopholes used by their in-app creators to funnel users to external payment systems (Pei Li/Bloomberg)
Infoblox and Eclypsium: since 2018, Russian hackers hijacked 35K+ registered domains using Sitting Ducks attacks that involve exploiting DNS configuration flaws (Bill Toulas/BleepingComputer)
Contextual AI, which offers retrieval augmented generation tools for enterprises, raised an $80M Series A led by Greycroft; PitchBook values Contextual at $609M (Kenrick Cai/Reuters)
